# Contributing

Install appraisal

```bash
gem install bundler -v 1.17.3
gem install appraisal
```

Bundle

```bash
bundle install
```

Bootstrap

```bash
appraisal install
```

Run the test suite:

```bash
appraisal rspec
```

If you modified any of the documentation files verify their format:

```bash
mdl *.md
```
